Aluno da Licenceciatura em Intelegência Artificial e Ciência de Dados

Perfil

Aluno de licenciatura autodidata, focado e apaixonado por resolução de problemas, programação e algoritmos. Adaptável, inspirado e ansioso para usar o meu conhecimento em oportunidades inovadoras e sustentáveis que me permitam desenvolver ainda mais minhas habilidades

Educação

Ciências Socioeconómicas, Ensino Secundário 2018-2021
Colégio Paulo VI
  • Throughout this period, I studied Math and some social sciences such as Geography and Economics. Even though I found those interesting, I was able to realise that was not what I wanted to my future and would rather seek a carrer in the hard sciences
  • At the same time I took part in a volunteering project organized by the school and had the oportunity to tutor a younger student and organize social events
  • I was able to graduate with a grade of 19.5
  • Looking back even though I don't use some part of the skills I have learned, I don't see it as a waste of time, but rather as a necessary step to find the rigth path.
Intelegência Artificial e Ciência de Dados, Licenciatura 2021-2024
Universidade do Porto
  • During this time I have been developing a solid foundation in Computer Science, as well as diving deeply in AI and Data Science topics
  • I worked on a variety of projects (that are available on my github) about different areas of Informatics and created my own implementations of some well known problems
  • I have now finished my second year and currently hold a grade of 17.75
  • Next year I'm looking forward to further learn about machine learning algorithms and practices, large scale data and robotics
